results.text: Your enemy's weapon is turned to dust with this mighty blow. If the foe has no weapon, inflict an additional 6 damage instead.
Gargantuan attack deals an additional [[2D6]] damage.
Ferocious attack disarms foe, literally. Foe loses a hand. Roll: 1D6 (1-3 weapon holding hand, 4-6 off hand)
A devastating strike shatters the skull and deals an additional [[1D12]] damage. Brain ruptures; lose [[1D6]] Brains.
Savage strike that would make Lord Randy proud! Deal normal damage, but foe suffers a -4 penalty to attack rolls for [[1D4]] turns.
Flawless blow hits foe, dealing normal damage. Target ineffectively tries to counterstrike. As you dodge the laughable attempt, make an additional attack.

An immaculate uppercut sends your foe to the ground, leaving them @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.Ej0fIoR2umnEbLfo.JournalEntryPage.Ub7F3RDnX9gdMr8O]{Prone}. Deal normal damage plus an additional [[1D4]]. Enemy must make an Agility Save to get up on their next turn.

The Combat Enhancement Drugs finally kick in. Gain +3 attack and +3 AC bonus. Your muscles begin to swell to enormous size, gaining you an additional [[/roll 1D12]] damage die. The effect wears off in 4 turns.
Slash to the face splits open the wretched fiend from ear to ear, spilling blood down their neck and dealing an additional [[2D6]] damage.
Your mighty blow hits as intended. As you clash with your adversary, you seize an opportunity and gouge out their eye. Deal an additional [[1D6]] damage as you leave your foe screaming in pain.

Blow to the head leaves the creep seeing stars. You deal normal damage and the fiend becomes @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.Ej0fIoR2umnEbLfo.JournalEntryPage.7rsMS8SopLGXIITx]{Dazed} for the next [[1D4]] turns.

Ancient forefathers call forth your name from the cosmos. Millions of years and galaxy-spanning battles unfold in your mind's eye in a brief moment that feels like an eternity. Using the knowledge gained from this glimpse into the past, you gain the ability to spend Brains Ability Points to deal more damage to your foes. For every Brains Point spent, add an additional [[/roll 1D12]] damage to this Attack.
Attack shatters ribcage. Broken ribs puncture lungs and vital organs, dealing an additional [[2D8]] damage and causing the foe to vomit blood and bile.
Swift swing of your weapon makes quick work of the foe's exposed throat, opening it wide and spraying blood everywhere as the foe emits a death rattle and takes an additional [[2D12]] damage.
Strike leaves your foe FUBAR, dealing an additional [[3D12]] damage. If the opponent survives this attack, they talk with a stutter, permanently.

Clean strike severs your foe's spinal cord, dropping them to the ground paralyzed. You grab the exposed spinal cord, pull it out, and hold it over your head. Each enemy that can see the carnage must make a [[/save resolve]] or roll on the Fear Table. Add the spinal cord trophy to your equipment.
You slide your weapon deep into the innards of your enemy, spilling their intestines all over the ground and dealing an additional [[4D12]] damage in the process.
Condemned to death! The Death Bringer underestimates their own strength, crushing their opponent's head and causing the fiend to make a [[/save death]] or fall dead.

Sliced in twain. Your weapon hums in your hands as you swing into the body of your enemy. The foe screeches in pain as your weapon splits their armor and shears through flesh all the way across the torso, effectively cutting them into two pieces effortlessly.

Lord Randy's judgment. Your foe grovels at your feet for forgiveness. You look to the heavens and ask WWLRD? The clouds part and Lord Randy himself is revealed standing with arms crossed and looking back at you. With a raised arm and extended thumb down, you know the answer. Looking back at your foe, you put your foot on their feeble shoulder. Spout a cheesy line from a 90's action movie as you lodge your weapon into their skull, killing them immediately.
